name: 2 Antonov An-124s Taking Off from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Follow me on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/dude847...

A very rare sight! These two Antonov 124s belonging to Antonov Airlines and Volga-Dnepr both took off from Calgary International Airport within 30 minutes of each other today. Both were carrying several spools of flex-pipe used for oil and gas gathering, bound for Saudi Arabia through Gander and Leipzig. I don't believe YYC has ever had this many An-124s here in a week (There were also two other Volga-Dnepr aircraft that I didn't catch). Enjoy these two massive Ukrainian birds taking to the skies.

ADB takeoff at 2:16
VDA takeoff at 5:35

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
